Hello,
This is a reminder that employee Performance Appraisal Summary (PAS) reports are due to the Human Resources Office (HRO) no later than March 31st. A review of our records shows that a report has not been received in the HRO for {!Performance_Appraisal_Tracking__c.Employee_Full_Name__c} .
Please email the completed PAS (STD 638) to PerformanceAppraisals-HR@dir.ca.gov no later than March 31st.
Thank you.
Human Resources
